snippet: Zhang Xuezhong, who teaches at the East China University of Political Science and Law in Shanghai, has repeatedly called on the Chinese government to abide by its own Constitution.
abstract: East China University officials have reportedly fired outspoken legal scholar Zhang Xuezhong for advocating free speech and for repeatedly calling on the government to abide by its own Constitution; university is one of China's most respected.
lead_paragraph: Zhang Xuezhong, who teaches at the East China University of Political Science and Law in Shanghai, has repeatedly called on the Chinese government to abide by its own Constitution.
